headline: GE HealthCare unveils Pristina Via to streamline technologist workflow and improve patient-centered breast care
summary: CHICAGO, November 26, 2024--Today GE HealthCare announced the new Pristina Via™* mammography system designed to enhance the screening experience for both technologists and patients. Debuting at the Radiological Society of North America’s 2024 Annual Meeting, this innovation provides mammography technologists with a suite of sophisticated tools that balance the demands of diagnostic accuracy and fast-paced workflows to facilitate more patient-centered breast care.

headline: Siemens Healthineers Offers Imaging-Driven Upside For Patient Investors
summary: Siemens Healthineers faces short-term challenges but offers long-term growth potential in imaging and radiation oncology, with 20% upside. Learn more on SEMHF stock here.
